text: Itte yaru ga ī. `Ten to ji ni aru subete no mono wa, dare no yūdearu no ka.' Itte yaru ga ī. `Arrā no yūdearu. Kare wa jihi o o jibun no Tsutomu to nasa reru. Shinpan no hi ni wa, kanarazu anata gata o shōshū sa reyou. Soreni utagai no yochi wa nai nodearu.'Daga jibun no tamashī o horoboshite shimatta mono wa, shinjinaidearou
